Description: Hello We have not received our Grocery to Go Order as of 200 pm Please advise If it is not coming a robo call needs to go out so all the seniors do not show up Christal Batey On Feb 12 2025 at 11 i Good morning Partners We hope this message finds you well Today February 12th 2025 the Capital Area Food Bank is operating solely in an administrative capacity and there will be no deliveries or pickups due to the current weather conditions For partners who have orders scheduled for tomorrow or Friday we plan to operate under normal conditions However if you anticipate that your agency will be closed due to the weather please reach out to Customer Relations as soon as possible to discuss rescheduling your order at partnersupportcapitalareafoodbankorg or 2026449845 Additionally even if your site remains open we require confirmation that your location has been safely plowed and salted to allow for safe deliveries If a driver arrives at your site and finds it is not adequately prepared please be aware that your agency may incur a restocking fee Our delivery equipment cannot navigate through snow or ice safely and we prioritize the safety of both our drivers and your staff We appreciate your cooperation and understanding as we work together to ensure everyones safety during this weather event We are actively monitoring the situation and will keep you updated with any changes regarding our operations for the rest of the week Thank you for your partnership Stay safe and warm Best regards Customer Relations
Summary: Customer wants to know the status of their Grocery to Go order and requests a robo call if necessary.
Request Category: Agency Administration -> Connection to CAFB Staff
Comments: 022025 0236Good afternoon Please reach out to the Senior Program at 2026449880 or shscapitalareafoodbankorg Unfortunately we cannot provide an ETA for your Grocery Go Order as that is managed by another department Thank you | 022025 0240I consulted with my fellow team member on the Senior Hunger Program and she let me know that your delivery on Tuesday 218 | 022025 0246Disregard Michelle let me know you are talking to someone on her team thank you

Description: Hello Thank you for reaching out to us Please reschedule the delivery for ACTS Hunger Prevention Center If it helps the sales order number is SO190198 Please note that we are closed on Fridays Thank you again and take care Chris Tuesday January 7 2025 1225 PM Shirley Couteau Important Update Regarding Your Orders Good morning Partners We hope this message finds you well We are reaching out to address the challenges posed by the inclement weather we have experienced over the past couple of days Unfortunately this has left us two days behind in our pulling schedule which has led us to make the difficult decision to cancel the orders originally scheduled for Wednesday January 8th We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause to your distribution plans We understand how vital these deliveries are to your operations Please note that we will need a response from your agency by the end of the business day on or the order will be canceled on our end Please note that we are rescheduling orders with the earliest openings being midweek next week This is due to our delivery and pickup schedules being full before the snow we experienced this week Please reach out to us to coordinate further We are fully aware of the impact that inclement weather can have on our collective efforts and we remain committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and yours during this time Thank you for your understanding and support as we navigate this situation together We are working quickly to get back on schedule Warm regards Customer Relations
Summary: Customer requests rescheduling of delivery for ACTS Hunger Prevention Center due to inclement weather.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Data/Time Change - Reschedule
Comments: 012025 1265d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f731a0b6a173e4eec88c6921bcb4b9e4f | 012025 0405Good afternoon We hope this message finds you well and that you are staying safe in this weather This is to confirm that your order SO190198 will be delivered on Monday January 13th from 10 AM to 12 PM Thank you

will then respond as soon as possible Thank you CH A This is shared with Zelda Shields Sent on August 19 2024 820 AM EDT | 082024 0244Good afternoon Thank you for your question Once you complete the checkout process your items are put on a sales order and finalized The emails you receive are due to potential errors in our inventory or the pulling process that may cause changes to your order before delivery This can happen for two main reasons Firstly if the pulling team finds that the items quality is not up to our standards for delivery it may be removed from your order or the quantity decreased This can occur when partners place orders well in advance and by the time the order is picked the item may no longer meet our quality standards Secondly if we run out of a certain product this could be due to periodic inventory errors where the actual count of items doesnt match whats on the menu While we strive to minimize these occurrences we send email notifications to keep partners Description: Dear Partner Support Team I hope this email finds you well My name is Taylor Allgood and I am with The Market at American University which recently placed an order through the Capital Area Food Bank We recently learned that oatmeal is now available for free on your website and we would greatly appreciate including some in our current order for if it is still possible to make modifications We understand that the 24hour window to modify or cancel the order has passed as of 125 However since it has only been one day beyond this period I wanted to kindly ask if you might be able to add a few boxes of oatmeal to our order We completely understand if the timing makes this addition difficult but we wanted to reach out in case it is feasible In any case we truly thank you for all your support Best regards Taylor Allgood Student Support Coordinator The Market American University tallgoodamericanedu
Summary: Customer wants to add oatmeal to their order.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Edit Order Items
Comments: 012025 1145Good morning Thank you for reaching out to Customer Service I appreciate your inquiry Unfortunately your order has already been pulled and fulfilled If it had not been fulfilled I would have requested that our Operations Team make a onetime courtesy addition to your order However since it has already been staged we are unable to add anything to your order at this time I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause Best regards
input_text: Orders - Pre delivery -> Edit Order Items | Customer wants to add oatmeal to their order.

Description: Dear Capital Area Food Bank Partner Support Team I hope this email finds you well I am writing on behalf of The Market at American University regarding our scheduled delivery on Monday January 6 between 122 pm Due to a potential winter storm there is a possibility that the university might be closed on that day Could you please let us know what the process would be for rescheduling or managing the delivery if the university is closed We want to ensure weaTMre prepared and can coordinate appropriately Thank you for your guidance and support Best regards
Summary: Customer wants to know the process for rescheduling a delivery due to a potential winter storm.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Data/Time Change - Reschedule
Comments: 012025 102bb9273c7be5434dad6f1d0fe73d99c7 | 012025 1251Good afternoon Thank you for reaching out to us We have an inclement weather policy that can be found on PartnerLink Typically when inclement weather is forecasted we urge our partners to contact us in advance before the Capital Area Food Bank makes a decision about whether we will be open for the day This way we can help reschedule orders to a later date if possible Please note that the Capital Area Food Bank does not follow government decisions regarding weather closures and delays Our Operations Department and leadership team make decisions about our operating hours based on weather and road conditions to ensure the safety of our drivers and partners The earliest time I can schedule your order is January 13th Please let me know if you would like to reschedule your order and I can take care of it on our end Thank you again for reaching out Best regards | 012025 072bb9273c7be5434dad6f1d0fe73d99c7Good evening Thank you for your response and for sharing the Capital Area Food BankaTMs inclement weather policy I wanted to let you know that as of 711 pm today American University has officially closed for tomorrow January 6 due to inclement weather As a result we will need to reschedule our order The proposed date of Monday January 13 works well for me if it aligns with your schedule Please let me Description: Can you tell me the expiration dates on the donated items in my order There were many items without pictures so its difficult to know if they are appropriate for my site as well I dont know the weight or size of each item

Comments: 012025 1065d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460fe7fd1c65f26b487eaf0d161c868bcc7b | 012025 1209Good afternoon Thank you for reaching out about the expiration dates on your product Unfortunately we cannot provide specific expiration dates for these items When a product is labeled as it means it is a compilation of dozens of different products under that category that have been donated These items are sorted by our volunteer teams or donated in bulk While our volunteers are instructed not to include expired foods items that are past their or dates are considered acceptable for consumption and may still be included We encourage all partners receiving these donated cases to be aware of this and to use the Food Coding Guide created by our Food Resources team and Nutrition Department Additionally we recommend using your knowledge of food safety and your senses to determine if the food is in good condition I apologize for not being able to provide further guidance on this matter The nature of donated products especially assorted bins makes it difficult to pinpoint a specific expiration date for a mix of different items Thank you

Description: Hello Of late I am not getting a phone call letting me know that the driver is on their way to our Pantry I enter a note for each of our orders asking that a driver call as they are leaving the warehouse so that our volunteers have enough time to get to our location when the truck arrives We are a small organization and our Pantry is just that a large closet that stores a tremendous amount of food We deliver our food to the clients so there is no office available for volunteers to wait When I scheduled todays delivery a morning slot was not available I had written asking if there would be any way to move our delivery up since we are normally an early delivery partner I was told that the delivery schedule was full for the morning so that I had to keep my noon 2 pm slot I happened to be at the Pantry to do some stocking and the truck arrived at 10 AM Luckily we were able to meet the driver with no delay to his schedule I would appreciate it if drivers could please view the special notesinstructions for each delivery I have been told by a few drivers that they do not see the special notes on their delivery receipt Thank you for your help Angela Harvey Pantry Manager Bethesda Help
Summary: Customer requests that drivers view special notes and instructions for each delivery.
Comments: 112024 1205Good afternoon Angela I hope this message finds you well Thank you for your valuable feedback regarding our delivery process I will connect with our Transportation Team to clarify the issue and explore ways to improve it Each morning our Transportation Leadership prints out the days sales orders which should include the notes you and your team leave I will doublecheck to ensure this process is still in place as we established a notes section specifically for partners to provide important information for our drivers Additionally I want to mention that there are times when drivers may finish their deliveries earlier than expected or we may have more drivers available than anticipated In such cases drivers are instructed to call you to ask if you would like to receive your order before your scheduled delivery window If you decline they should wait until your designated delivery window I will reach out to confirm these details and will follow up with you I understand that the current situation is not ideal and the implications it has on your distribution Best regards | 112024 0224Good afternoon Angela I just spoke with Joe the Transportation Manager He informed me that he discussed the delivery process and the expectation for courtesy calls with the driver who made your delivery yesterday as well as the team of drivers during their morning meeting today Joe confirmed that drivers should be able to see the notes you leave on your sales orders More importantly it is mandatory for them to call all partners before their deliveries even if they are within the designated delivery window This call is to inform you that they are on their way In instances where drivers can make earlier deliveries they must consult with you first to see if you can accommodate the earlier arrival if not they are expected to wait until the agreed delivery window If you continue to experience issues regarding this matter please let me know and I will arrange for Joe to give you a call to discuss it further Best

Description: Hello We would very much like to reschedule our Wednesday 18 delivery as soon as possible Like many other of your partners we rely almost exclusively on the food from CAFB Our client demand is at its highest during the first 10 days of the month so tomorrows scheduled delivery is critical for our operations Please let me know when our delivery can be rescheduled Thank you for your continued support and great work Angela Harvey Pantry Manager Bethesda Help Chris Tuesday January 7 2025 1225 PM aeharvey1007hotmailcom Important Update Regarding Your Orders Good morning Partners We hope this message finds you well We are reaching out to address the challenges posed by the inclement weather we have experienced over the past couple of days Unfortunately this has left us two days behind in our pulling schedule which has led us to make the difficult decision to cancel the orders originally scheduled for Wednesday January 8th We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause to your distribution plans We understand how vital these deliveries are to your operations Please note that we will need a response from your agency by the end of the business day on or the order will be canceled on our end Please note that we are rescheduling orders with the earliest openings being midweek next week This is due to our delivery and pickup schedules being full before the snow we experienced this week Please reach out to us to coordinate further We are fully aware of the impact that inclement weather can have on our collective efforts and we remain committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and yours during this time Thank you for your understanding and support as we navigate this situation together We are working quickly to get back on schedule Warm regards Customer Relations
Summary: Customer wants to reschedule their delivery for a later date due to inclement weather.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Data/Time Change - Reschedule
Comments: 012025 0542Good afternoon Thank you for your message I understand the urgency of your order especially given the current needs of our clients I have escalated this issue to my team in the Operations Department who will be back at work tomorrow We will do our best to fulfill your order as quickly as possible I will follow up with you tomorrow to provide an update on your order Thank you | 012025 0128This is confirmation that your order has been rescheduled to Thursday January 9th from 12 pm to 2 pm Have a blessed day I put in a note that if we had a early time slot to please move your order

Description: Hi Team I hope you all are doing well It seems some feedback from partners around the pallets being too high or double stacked have really increased in the past couple of weeks I wanted to touch base with you all to see what may be causing this and if there are any possible solutions we can come up with to help partners while not impeding your processes Thank you Alanna Than Tran Friday November 15 2024 114 PM Alanna King MaiTam Nguyen Tuong Phan BPSOS Delivery Issue Hello Alanna This is Than from BPSOS I am writing this to let you know about an issue with our food delivery this morning 1115 We ordered a total of 8 or 9 pallets of vegetables this morning However those pallets were stacked on top of each other as a pair when they were delivered We asked the driver if he could bring the pallets down since they are very heavy and our office did not have any equipment to handle that He said that there was nothing he could do because they were loaded into the truck like that We did have this issue in the past and it took our staff a tremendous amount of effort to handle it We always appreciate CAFB for providing the food for free but in the future it would be great if you do not stack pallets on top of each other If you have no choice but to do so please let us know in advance Best Program Coordinator BPSOS Inc 6066 Leesburg Pike Suite 100 Falls Church VA 22041 Phone 5382190 Fax 5382191 If a federal employee or in the military you can support our mission through CFC Charity No 10038 CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE
Summary: Customer reports an issue with food delivery, specifically that the pallets were stacked on top of each other and heavy, and requests that CAFB be aware of this in the future.
Comments: 112024 0219 | 112024 0338c8249284fe40dc890161d65a68f6d3Hello Alanna I know that is currently working with operations to resolve these issues She will be back next week and can let you know if there have been any updates CIArra | 112024 0419Okay great thank you | 112024 0734Good morning Alanna Thank you for bringing this to our attention Let me look into this and I will get back to you Thanks Karen Alexander | 112024 1223Good morning Alanna I apologize for the delay in my response I hope you are doing well This is feedback that we have received across the regions and I have communicated it to the Operations Teams for their awareness For now please relay the message below to the partner Good afternoon The Customer Relations Team has reported your concerns to our Senior Managers in Operations and they are committed to helping our partners address these challenges They will be reviewing options to improve the situation moving forward For the time being items will continue to be packed as they are currently but the team is looking into alternatives that would make unpacking easier for you and other agencies I will keep you updated on any developments I want to assure you that your feedback has been heard and is being taken into consideration The reason for the current packing method is due to truck capacity If the pallets are not stacked they will take up more space in the truck and could potentially require multiple trucks for delivery Our drivers carry pallet jacks with them on their routes but they do not have reach machines like those used in the warehouse to pull orders and unstack items We are working on this and I apologize for the challenges it presents Please reach out to patnersupportcapitalareafoodbankorgwith with any concerns you may have Best regards | 112024 1224
input_text: Feedback - Concern / Negative -> Operations | Customer reports an issue with food delivery, specifically that the pallets were stacked on top of each other and heavy, and requests that CAFB be aware of this in the future.

Description: Good afternoon I wanted to follow up with you all regarding the issue with Capital Christian Fellowships produce hub earlier this week CCF adds food and edits the SO I make for their produce hubs In the past few months they have added thousands of pounds of food to these orders making them close to 40k pounds sometimes For the most recent hub order someone at CCF accidentally removed 3k pounds of produce meant for the produce hub Christ let me know that this can happen since the produce is marked as available for agencies and CAFB staff We are having a meeting tomorrow with CCF to discuss the produce hub orders I wanted to reach out to you all to get your insight on whether it would be beneficial for TransportationOps If there is a specific pound limit that I should tell them not to exceed when adding food to the produce hub SOs I can do that as well I know that the produce limitations will impact their ordering so their order sizes will probably decrease in the next few months Please let me know if there is anything you would like me to mention during the meeting tomorrow Thank you again for all your help Best Grace Ferrara
Summary: Customer wants to discuss the issue with Capital Christian Fellowships produce hub and its impact on TransportationOps order sizes.
Comments: 112024 12d61862e78f0544ada71f343edd30d657 | 112024 0237Good afternoon Grace I hope you are doing well I wanted to bring this matter to Austin and discuss it with her I understand the implications of the large orders and the concerns surrounding the removal of produce for the produce hub When I spoke to Austin she suggested that the first step should be to have a conversation with the partner to explain the implications of their edits to the order They need to be mindful that they donaTMt want to lose their produce items meant for the hub and that they should be aware of the weight of their orders when placing them Here are two key points I discussed with Austin 1 Currently we do not have a formal limit for orders so we cannot tell them what a limit would be Operations and ERPIT are working on measures to ensure that for large orders the number of delivery blocks corresponds appropriately For example two weeks ago Capital ChristianaTMs order required five trucks for delivery but only occupied one slot which is unrealistic For now we can only ensure that Operations is aware and prepared for these situations 2 Austin mentioned that if this situation continues to cause recurring issues and impacts the produce hubs participating sitesaresulting in a loss of produceawe can consider locking their orders for the produce hubs and requesting that they create a separate order However this could complicate matters since Operations has asked us to consolidate orders for the same partner to avoid having one sales order versus two We can explore this locking option as a last resort if recurring issues continue I hope this clarifies the situation and please let me know if you need any assistance in engaging with the partner Best

Description: Good morning Do you think the request not to stack could be adhered to If so I will put a note on their future produce hub orders I am not sure who to loop in from ops so please feel free to loop them in as needed Thank you Augusta Marie Odah Thursday August 15 2024 423 PM Augusta Fricke Produce Hub Request Hi Augusta I hope my email finds you well I have a request about the Produce Hub is it possible that the pallets of produce are not stacked on top of each other SEED comes with a truck like the one from CAFB so it uses the pallet jack to pick up their produce but when the pallets are stacked on top of each other we have no way to lower the pallet of produce which is on top which we forced to cut the cardboard to extract the product into a bin so that another partner can have its product If the pallets come individually each organization has the possibility of collecting its pallet of produce to its truck Also I looked at the order for the Hub but I only saw 50 squash boxes instead of 176 Will the rest be added later Thank you Augusta Marie ODAH Administrative Assistant Coordinator of Food Pantry Immigrant Resourcing Capital Christian Fellowship

Description: Good morning CAFB team I hope my email finds you well The form to make the request is no longer available which is why I am sending you this email CAFB has given our Food pantry a limit of 16250 pounds per month but we would be grateful if we could have a very higher produce allocation otherwise our distribution will be in trouble The first reason is that each week we have over 500 guests at our Food distribution and the number is only increasing We have 4 distributions in a month 16250 pounds per month is 8 pallets per month We cannot feed more than 500 people per week with only 8 pallets per month so we will be forced to reduce our distribution to 1 day per month instead of 4 per month 8 pallets is the minimum number of pallets of food we use for a single distribution in the month If you look at our order history for the past several months we have been doing 2 orders per week one on Tuesday and one on Wednesday in order to have enough produce for all the families that come The second reason is that CAFB is our only food supplier If you maintain the limit of 16250 pounds per month the question for us will be how are we going to get the difference in food that we will no longer have Having no other suppliers the only solution will still be to reduce the distribution days The third reason is that we do not make our choices based on the pound because we have the space in our Gym to store at least 40 pallets against the wall if they are pallets stored one on top of the other that makes us more than 80 and we can also store 12 pallets in our Food pantry room so we have plenty of space to store the food We make our choices taking into account the diversity of food because of the diversity of cultures who come to take the food I hope that all these explanations will make us find favor in your eyes so that you increase our pound limit Thank you in advance Be blessed
Summary: Customer requests an increase in the monthly produce allocation for their food pantry, citing reasons such as the increasing number of guests, limited storage space, and the importance of diversity in the food provided.
Request Category: Agency Administration -> Connection to CAFB Staff
Comments: 112024 1128Good morning I hope you are doing well Thank you for sending this over The Regional Maryland Team will need this letter as they are responsible for managing all matters related to the Produce Limits Since I cannot forward tickets in the portal please send your email to Augusta Grace and Gaby on the Maryland Team Their email addresses are provided below Augusta Grace Gaby Best | 112024 0165d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f3e811295a79f43b59b948d895785c52aThank you so much | 112024 01f58131cbb67d43c7b30d6b58d40bd077Customer has replied after the ticket has been resolved

Description: Good morning CAFB I hope my email finds you well I sent you yesterday an email about a message that appears on your site while placing orders but I did not receive an answer yet The message says aYou are required to verify all your hours of operation records before 102024 or your account will be lockeda What hours of operation must be recorded I dont really understand this message Thank you in advance for the explanation Also in our October 1st order there is item 100773 Good Culture Probiotic Whole Milk which needs to be refrigerated Is it possible for it to be delivered with our other orders on Wednesday which is our distribution day This will save us the storage problem Thank you in advance Be blessed
Summary: Customer is asking for clarification on a message they received on the website and also requesting that an item be delivered on a specific day.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Edit Order Items
Comments: 092024 11b15fa988bc6049b4aa6fe30b7a3629c1Good afternoon Thank you for reaching out We will not be hosting another training session but there are tools available to assist you You can find a guide in PDF format called under the Partner Resource Tab on PartnerLink This document provides instructions on how to update your hours of operation Once you are logged into PartnerLink click on your agency name to access your Account Overview Under Additional Information you will find a button labeled Click on it to view the hours currently listed for your agency If the hours are correct click to confirm If the hours are not correct please make the necessary changes by clicking aedita submit them and once approved by your Regional Coordinator the updated hours will be officially updated If you still need assistance please attend one of our online Office Hours every Wednesday from 10am10am Also I have moved item 100773 Good Culture Probiotic Whole Milk to for Wednesday delivery Thank you Charity

Description: Good afternoon Team CAFB Hope you had a great Thanksgiving We have a concern about the milk that will be delivered to us on Wednesday December 4 Is it possible that for this time the amount will be reduced to instead of 108 The reason is that at our last milk distribution we noticed that our guests were very careful about the best byexpiration date and we had milk that was left over This was not a problem at that time because we were able to keep them in the refrigerator until the following food distribution But we have the same leftover milk we do not have enough space in the refrigerator at the moment to keep them and we do not want to waste food This is why we want to be careful Thank you in advance for your understanding Have a blessed day
Summary: Customer wants to reduce the amount of milk to be delivered on Wednesday, December 4 due to lack of refrigerator space.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Edit Order Items

Description: We are by this mail request Capital Area Foodbank to include in our order for this month 100pcs of Turkey for Thanksgiving whenever it is available Our intention is to have our food give out on Saturday 23rd November 2024 by 12noon We thank you for your cooperation in this matter Regards Godwin Binutu For CCC Covenant Parish 2404678399
Summary: Customer wants to include 100 pieces of turkey in their order for Thanksgiving.
Comments: 112024 0235Good afternoon Godwin This year our Food Procurement Team purchased two truckloads of turkeys each at a cost of approximately 60 to 70 per case and were available on PartnerLink These turkeys have been allocated to various orders and are no longer available I reached out to my colleagues on the Food Resources Team who informed me that we often receive donated turkeys These donations will be provided at no cost now that the shared maintenance fee has been waived for donated items However Typically individuals and organizations tend to donate turkeys closer to Thanksgiving usually in the week before the holiday or during the holiday week itself Please continue to check the menu regularly to see if turkeys are added If we do receive them they will be added to the menu and available to partners on a firstcome firstserved basis Thank you DH | 112024 0165d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f5c4638d0a06942d198e3db15c053b8aeDear Harmon Thank you for your response We buy Turkey every year from CAFB in bulk you can check your record I think our organization should have been given some consideration during the sharing of 2 trucks load of Turkey We dont rely on donations we buy our Turkey every year We observed that since Elvis left we have been having issues inrespect of our order this is very unfair Our community are expecting thanksgiving Turkey from us only to disappoint them at the end Regards Godwin Binutu | 112024 0100Good afternoon Godwin I hope this message finds you well Thank you for reaching out to me again regarding the turkey availability I completely understand how important this is for your community especially during the holidays I want to clarify that all the turkeys we receive are available on a first come first served basis for all our partners just like other items on the menu I also realize that in previous years there was a fee associated with our donated turkeys However IaTMm pleased to share that this fee has been waived for this fiscal year so itaTMs possible you may have paid in the past but you would not have to this time for the donated product I genuinely want to ensure that you and your clients receive the support you need this holiday season I understand how quickly these items can disappear from the menu and I encourage you to check it daily as we frequently add new products Right now we also have vegetable oil stuffing mix corn muffin mix canned collard greens and beans that might help supplement your holiday distributions Please feel free to check the menu regularly and if I see any additional turkeys come available I will reach out to you Thank you for your understanding and know that we are here to support you and your community during this important time Warm regards DH Manager of Customer Relations Distribution Network Evolution Capital Area Food Bank P 5713909875 7035410179 4900 Puerto Rico Ave NE Washington DC 20017 Please email all customer service questions or concerns to so that one of my colleagues or I can assist you promptly Thank you | 112024 0126Hello Godwin IaTMm sorry to hear that you feel you havenaTMt gotten the service you would like since there have been changes in staff I would be happy to connect with you to discuss any challenges you are having Regarding the turkeys unfortunately we donaTMt have the capacity to track every partner that has received turkeys in the past and it wouldnaTMt be fair to our other partners to reserve inventory for a select few However there are times when we will receive a donation that is specifically allocated for the DC region While this isnaTMt a guarantee that we will receive such a donation nor a promise to reserve anything the regional team has made note of your interest and will notify you if we receive a special donation of turkeys for the region As mentioned I also encourage you to continue checking PartnerLink so you will be aware as new items are added Please let me know if you have any further questions for the DC regional team Thank you for your continued partnership and the work you are doing to serve our community Best Laura | 112024 0859Closing this ticket and responding to his other open ticket | 112024 1165d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f5c4638d0a06942d198e3db15c053b8aeThank you for your assistance | 112024 11f58131cbb67d43c7b30d6b58d40bd077Customer has replied after the ticket has been resolved

Description: Good afternoon As we begin our TEFAP program we are wondering if we can place orders for TEFAP food as well as our regular food distribution and have them delivered on the same day Our goal is to have the TEFAP food on one order and regular food distribution items on another so that when delivered it is easy for our team to store in the appropriate space Thanks
Summary: Customer wants to place orders for TEFAP food and regular food distribution on the same day.
Comments: 092024 0409Good afternoon Thank you for contacting Customer Relations You are able to place orders that include TEFAP products and regular menu items together However please note that deliveries containing only TEFAP products are free of charge while orders with a mix of TEFAP and regular menu items will incur a 75 delivery fee Many of our partners do place orders with both types of food without any issues

Description: Centreville United Methodist Church is planning to pick up order SO195586 as scheduled on Thursday morning unless conditions unexpectedly become worse than anticipated If our plans change we will let you know Blessings Phil Rev Phil Mohr PhD Deacon Director of Missions and Communications Centreville United Methodist Church 6400 Old Centreville Road Centreville VA 20121 Office 7038302684 Cell 7034399734 Email Website partner Support Tuesday February 11 2025 805 AM Important Weather Updates from CAFB Good afternoon Partners We hope you are all doing well As many of you may know snowy weather conditions are expected today The latest forecast indicates that snow will likely begin this afternoon so we currently plan for all orders scheduled for Tuesday February 11th to proceed as originally scheduled The most significant weather impact is anticipated on Wednesday February 12th As a result we will be rescheduling or canceling orders for that day in preparation We encourage partners with orders scheduled for Wednesday to proactively reach out to us at or 2026449845 to discuss potential rescheduling This will help us manage any challenges related to the expected snowfall For partners with orders scheduled for the rest of the week including Wednesday Thursday or Friday we appreciate your communication regarding any plans to delay or cancel your orders Effective communication is crucial for prioritizing the safety of both our team and yours Together we can navigate this snowy weather safely and efficiently We will keep you updated on any final decisions made by our Operations and Leadership Teams regarding delays or closures Thank you for your understanding and partnership If you have any questions or concerns please donaTMt hesitate to reach out Best regards Customer Relations

Description: Hi Maria Thank you for reaching out about these issues with your order IaTMm adding on this email so that they can decide how best to proceed DonaTMt ever hesitate to reach out about incorrect orders even if itaTMs just a minor mistake We want to be sure our inventory is always correct so it helps to have partners let us know when weaTMve made a mistake Thanks Joanna Joanna Miller VA TEFAP Specialist Capital Area Food Bank P 5714824781 6833 Hill Park Drive Lorton VA 22079 Maria E Rodriguez Wednesday November 13 2024 233 PM Joanna Miller Order SO182764 Hello Joanna I just came back from vacation yesterday and was looking over our inventory to compose our guidelines for this week and noticed that the chicken that we received on Friday was not the TEFAP chicken that we had ordered for pick up on 1108 Its on our team for not checking properly the case size and weight but the chicken which we received was the following 300595 Chicken Leg Quarters Halal 5 Chicken Leg Quarters Halal 5 65 lbs Bag We received 9 cases of the above chicken I knew it wasnt correct based on the count and the fact that it was halal I believe this is a purchase item through the CAFB website and wanted to check with you and the team to see how you would like to proceed As a side note on a past order we received 6 cases of TEFAP red kidney beans instead we had ordered 6 cases of TEFAP pears which was a minor problem and explained the importance of checking the order with our team prior to accepting The information contained in this communication from sent at 20241113 1459 is confidential and may be legally privileged It is intended solely for use by the intended recipient and others authorized to receive it If you have received this communication in error you are hereby notified that any disclosure copying distribution or taking action in reliance of the contents of this information is strictly prohibited and may be unlawful
Summary: Customer wants to report an issue with the chicken received in their order and wants to know how to proceed.
Comments: 112024 0314 | 112024 0932Good morning Joanna No problem I will go ahead and address this with Operations | 112024 1133Good morning Maria Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention I appreciate your prompt reporting We have informed our Operations Team about the matter and they are currently calibrating our inventory to address it internally Please follow Joannas guidance on how to report only what you actually received We will take care of the necessary items on our end In the future if similar instances occur please make sure to review your order thoroughly upon delivery If you notice any discrepancies contact us immediately at partnersupportcapitalareafoodbankorg so we can escalate the issue to our Operations Team as soon as possible Thank you for your cooperation Best regards

Description: To whom it may concern I received email that stated we have not attended the online Hours of operations training yet I Mary Collins from Clothing Of Power Eternal Church attended the August 22 2024 900 To 1000 class Do you have any way to check who attended that day Thanks Mary Collins maryyyyhotmailcom Reminder for Mandatory Hours of Operations Training Good afternoon Partners If you are receiving this email it means you have not yet attended one of our mandatory Hours of Operations Trainings There is a new feature available on PartnerLink that allows partners to update their hours of operations for their distributions This feature will enable you to keep your records up to date as required which is important for ensuring that we have the most current information in our internal systems for our clients to use Once approved the information collected from your updates will be linked to our online tool that clients can use to find food assistance To ensure that all partners understand how to use this function we have hosted three trainings and there is one session remaining on These sessions have been designed to demonstrate how to use this feature and provide an opportunity to speak to our team about PartnerLink and offer feedback Please note that this training is mandatory You can use this link to your agency Once you fill out the form entirely a Zoom link with a calendar invite will be sent to your email We only require one representative per agency to attend but we encourage all shoppers who have access to PartnerLink to join We suggest that this person work closely with the food program and have a deep understanding of operations While the training will be recorded and slides will be shared all partners are expected to attend the live training to meet the requirement If you have any questions please feel free to contact Customer Relations Thank you The Customer Relations Team
Summary: Customer requests information on how to check who attended a training session.
Comments: 092024 0239Good afternoon Thank you for reaching out I have corrected this on our attendance log Thank you
input_text: Agency Administration -> Partner Trainings | Customer requests information on how to check who attended a training session.

Description: Partner Support this email was received at 805pm the evening prior to my delivery and distribution more than half of my order is not going to be delivered tomorrow In order to better service your partners and the community please provide changes to orders in enough time to allow partners a better reaction time to supply the items not being provided Thank you Janaclese Woods Pantry Director Cornerstone Peaceful Bible Baptist Church On 122024 8 Dear Valued Partner We regret to inform you that we had to remove or reduce the quantity of item from your order Below is a list of item and reason for the change We understand that this change may cause inconvenience to you and your distribution plans and we apologize for the inconvenience Please note that if you are receiving this notification after your order has been locked which is three business days before your order is due to be picked up or delivered this change is most likely occurring during or after the pulling stage and unfortunately we cannot replace the item removed or make any further additions during this time period Item Reason for Change Ordering Error Ordering Error Ordering Error Write Off of Inventory To review an updated version of your order please log in to PartnerLink and visit the Order History tab If you have any queries or concerns please do not hesitate to contact us at Thank you for your understanding and continued support Best regards Partner Support
Summary: Partner Support notifies the customer of changes to their order and provides reasons for the changes.
Comments: 122024 0925Good morning Thank you for your ticket submitted to Customer Service I have reviewed your order and spoken with our operations team I can confirm that your order has been fulfilled and you will be receiving your items Attached is a list of the items fulfilled in your order You will be receiving the following 30 520480 MD TEFAP CRANBERRIES DRIED 12 520020 MD TEFAP ENT RICE US2 LONG 25 520030 MD TEFAP BON Salmon Pink 12 520470 MD TEFAP BON ASPARAGUS 86 520263 MD TEFAP ENT PEANUT BUTTER 44 520053 MD TEFAP BON Apples Fresh 15 362014 Eggs 30 dozen I apologize for any confusion in the automated message Best regards

Description: Does CAFB assist with grants for transportation for food pantries We are in need of a cargo van to transport food to our clients located in senior buildings and also to provide food on an emergency basis which requires transporting the food to the client If not able can you provide resources and grant opportunities that cover nonprofit organizations and transportation Thank you Janaclese Woods
Summary: Customer is seeking assistance with grants for transportation for food pantries.
Request Category: Agency Administration -> Connection to CAFB Staff
Comments: 092024 1218Good afternoon Partner Thank you for your inquiry about Capacity Grants We do indeed offer Capacity Grants at Capital Area Food Bank intended to help our partners expand their operations by providing financial assistance to cover the cost of items like storage or a vehicle The Capacity Grant Application is embedded in our 2024 Fall BiAnnual Survey which will be released to partners in the second week of October Please note that you will need to open and fill out the survey to access the Capacity Grant Application and then submit it Once you submit your application it will be reviewed by your Regional Team for consideration Thank you Customer Relations | 092024 1219Please also reach out to your Regional Team Members to learn more about external grant opportunities that may be available for support
input_text: Agency Administration -> Connection to CAFB Staff | Customer is seeking assistance with grants for transportation for food pantries.

Description: Hello Can you please cancel my order and I will do a new one Thank you Angela Wilson from Crossover Church My order was for Wednesday Jan 8th at 1000 am today Angela Wilson sent from my iPhone On Jan 7 2025 at 12 i Good morning Partners We hope this message finds you well We are reaching out to address the challenges posed by the inclement weather we have experienced over the past couple of days Unfortunately this has left us two days behind in our pulling schedule which has led us to make the difficult decision to cancel the orders originally scheduled for Wednesday January 8th We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause to your distribution plans We understand how vital these deliveries are to your operations Please note that we will need a response from your agency by the end of the business day on or the order will be canceled on our end Please note that we are rescheduling orders with the earliest openings being midweek next week This is due to our delivery and pickup schedules being full before the snow we experienced this week Please reach out to us to coordinate further We are fully aware of the impact that inclement weather can have on our collective efforts and we remain committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and yours during this time Thank you for your understanding and support as we navigate this situation together We are working quickly to get back on schedule Warm regards Customer Relations
Summary: Customer wants to cancel their order due to inclement weather and reschedule for a later date.
Comments: 012025 1157Good afternoon Thank you for contacting Customer Relations Your order has been canceled
input_text: Orders - Pre delivery -> Cancelation | Customer wants to cancel their order due to inclement weather and reschedule for a later date.

Comments: 112024 11b15fa988bc6049b4aa6fe30b7a3629c1Good morning Thank you for contacting customer support If you are having any issues editing your order please contact customer support as soon as possible and we are happy to make the changes for you as we do not recommend creating multiple orders and please keep in mind that all orders lock 3 business days before your scheduled pickup or delivery date Both SO186448 and SO186453 are locked for edits I will look into what we can do to combine your orders for 1102 Charity | 112024 1165d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f1ecfe059a1f84eb49014624ee8f0fc50That would be great thank you | 112024 0212Good morning I hope this message finds you well I wanted to reach out regarding your request I have combined everything for your order tomorrow into SO185606 Going forward please contact us by phone or email before creating multiple orders The reason we do not combine orders is that systematically it can cause issues It makes it difficult to manage produce on orders and can lead to losing items due to backorders Additionally please be aware that with the new produce limits we are introducing partners will need to wait 30 minutes after placing an order to edit it Moreover there will be another 30minute waiting period after making any edits before further changes can be made We appreciate your patience as we navigate this change Thank you Best

Description: Yes Thank you so much On Mon May 13 2024 at 16 Dear Partners We hope this message finds you well We are reaching out to you today because we have discovered a system error that mistakenly marked Tuesday May 28th as Memorial Day instead of Monday May 27th As a result some of you were able to place an order for that day We apologize for any confusion this may have caused Please be advised that on the actual day of Memorial Day Monday May 27th Capital Area Food Bank will be closed Because of this we will need to move the day of your delivery to ensure that you receive your order on a different day that works with your schedule In order to make this change as quickly as possible please respond to this message at your earliest convenience with the most convenient day for your delivery We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding Thank you for your patience and cooperation Sincerely Partner Support DH Manager of Customer Relations Distribution Network Evolution Capital Area Food Bank P 5713909875 7035410179 Please email all customer service questions or concerns to so that one of my colleagues or I can assist you promptly Thank you
Summary: Customer wants to reschedule delivery due to a system error.

Description: Good afternoon Our organization received an order SO177371 last Friday 102024 but later discovered that some of the dry items dates had expired since March 3 2024 and September 11 2024 Some of the dry items found expired were 100749 CEREAL TOAST WHEAT 10164 lbs Case expired on 0304 2024 100756 Mealonthego Box 24 cases Each case contains Croissant W106 oz Case expired on 092024 Also the collard greens 800155 Collard Greens 25 box FULL PALLET 42cs were all bad on arrival Is it possible that some of these dry items are opened and checked out especially for expiration dates before shipping Thank you
Summary: Customer reports expired items in their order and asks if they can be checked before shipping.
Request Category: Menu -> Product Best By / Expiration Date
Comments: 102024 0838c8249284fe40dc890161d65a68f6d3Good evening and thank you for contacting customer support We appreciate your feedback and apologize for the inconvenience I will escalate this issue to my management and inventory team and follow up with you as soon as I receive updates on their investigation Would you be able to provide photos of the collard greens Are the collard greens still at your site or will you be needing a driver to come retrieve them CiArra | 102024 0938c8249284fe40dc890161d65a68f6d3Good morning I will meet with my manager this afternoon about the expired products and follow up with you as soon as possible Just want to follow up with you Would you be able to provide photos of the collard greens Are the collard greens still at your site or will you be needing a driver to come retrieve them CiArra | 102024 11bbec158f60e14a029348cf49bf031884Good morning Unfortunately we threw all the collard greens in the trash Id take pictures next time I see any bad produce before trashing Please let me know if you need any other information Thank you | 102024 1215Good afternoon Thank you for contacting us about food item dates and quality issues We want to ensure that all the food leaving our warehouse is safe for consumption and properly dated for your knowledge Some of the items you mentioned are As we increase the donated products on our menu I want to make sure that all partners are aware that Capital Area Food Bank accepts donations with items past their best by and sell by dates The best by date is an indicator of the quality of a product but is not a safety date The sell by date is for inventory management and tells the store for how long to display the product for sale The product can still be consumed after this date Its important to note that many of our donated products will be past these dates but they are not expired and are still safe for consumption We have food coding guides that partners can print and reference during distributions When available they can be ordered in English and Spanish from our Nutrition Education Department The dates on some products may cause concerns for partners and their clients but we urge you all to differentiate between the different dates on products use the food coding guide as a reference and also use your best judgment as well as your food safety knowledge If you have a product that is not of the right consistency has an odor or you believe to be not okay please let us know and discard the item immediately As we increase our donations we may encounter some challenges but please work with us and continue to provide us with feedback Additionally if you ever have an issue with fresh produce please include photos of the items so that we can forward them to our Operations and Food Resourcing Departments for their knowledge We appreciate your partnership with us in this For Nutrition Materials including the Food Coding Guide please email

Description: Dear partner support coordinator we at FBC KenGar have grant allocations from 3 different grants 2 of the expires in 30 days and the third expires in June When we order food the funds are taken out of the grant that expires later Is there any way that you could take the money from the accounts that expire first It would be greatly appreciated Thanks FBC coordinator
Summary: Customer wants to know if there is a way to take money from grant accounts that expire later when ordering food to avoid overspending.
Comments: 042024 0349Good afternoon Thank you for contacting our Customer Service Id be happy to assist you with your query Our system applies grants on a perlineitem basis meaning only one grant can be applied to each line item In your past couple of orders you have had line items with high numbers ranging from 250 to 265330 A The system is going to use the grant that has enough available funds which might not be the one with the closest expiration date Please see below You have three grants 1G 3000 SO136067 used 89000 SO122558 used 81260 Remaining Balance 51498 1H 2378 SO146902 used 76258 SO142621 used 149884 Remaining Balance 11658 1I 6564 was placed and totaled in 85420 the only grant that could cover the entirety of this line item for the chicken was your 1I grant If the system pulled from either of your other two grants it would not cover the total cost of the chicken I hope this clarifies the situation If you have any more questions please feel free to ask Best regards | Description: Good morning FISH of Laurel is so very happy to receive this 600685 grant as it has been many years since we have received a grant from CAFB I have a question about invoice 194073 On 214 we received the following email Dear FISH of Laurel Inc We are delighted to inform you that your organization has been awardedA grantA funding to support your efforts in addressing food security in our communityA A has been awarded to your organization under the new food creditA grantA aA FY25 Maryland DHSA and the funds were made available in your account onA MondayA February 10th 2025 Partner food credits can be used by your organization toA purchaseA grantA eligible items using CAFBaTMs Partner Link MenuA A Your partner food creditA grantA deadline is May 15th 2025 Please remember that the food creditA grantA deadline is applied to the delivery or pick up scheduled date not the date you placed the order CAFB reserves the right to change deadlines and to reallocate andor extendA grantA deadlines based on partner usage to ensure contract requirements are being met If your organization cannot use the fullA grantA amount before the deadline please tell us as soon as possibleA A A A A A Are you able to apply the grant to this order I believe that a number of items on this order are grant designated Thanks Linda

Description: Hello Eric Here is the link to register for our CAFB Smart Shopping Training with our Customer Relations Team There are 2 trainings offered each month You can register for the time that is most convenient for you Please reach out to me or Partner Support at if you have any questions about the training Thank you Erin Brown DC Partnership Coordinator Capital Area Food Bank P 2027695614 4900 Puerto Rico Avenue NE Washington DC 20017 capitalareafoodbankorg E Ray Monday January 13 2025 213 PM Lauren Forbes Laura Jeske Erin Brown Re Account Set up and Access for Eric Ray Thanks Lauren If its the same one I got from Zaynab Then I havent been getting them The only mobile distribution request was from you when we met Nothing before that It most likely went to Carrie Erin I look forward to hearing from you Thanks Eric On Mon Jan 13 2025 1 Hello Eric Thank you so much for reaching out Ive added our DC coordinator Erin Brown here who can assist you with signing up for SMART shopping training Could you confirm youve been receiving the monthly report to record the data for the mobile distributions If you could send me the date for the next one that would be great Should you need anything else please let me know From E Ray Monday January 13 2025 1015 AM Lauren Forbes Laura Jeske FLCCCrowder Owens Food Bank Account Set up and Access for Eric Ray Hi Lauren Im returning from the holidays and the snow We are in transition and as you may know Carrie is no longer with FLCCCrowder Owens Food Bank As I work my way through a lot of backend stuff I now have access to I also need access to the portal to place orders do reports etc Can you assist me with that Thanks Eric Eric EK Ray Publicist Media Consultant C2029035597 E

Description: Hi Everyone I just wanted to follow up on the email below can you all please update the main contact for Floris UMC to be Katie Rakestraw Thank you Alanna Alanna King Wednesday July 17 2024 437 PM CH Fw Change in contact information Sorry for so many emails today lots of partners are requesting changes in contacts right now Can you all please make Katie the new main contact it is saying she does not have the password associated with the email Thanks Alanna Partnership Coordinator VA Region Capital Area Food Bank 5714824773 6833 Hill Park Dr Lorton VA 22079 Katie Rakestraw Tuesday July 16 2024 1245 PM Alanna King dporterflorisumcorg Change in contact information Hi Alanna It was good to see you today As Donna mentioned our agency contact info is changing Donna and I will continue to be the daytoday contacts and need to receive copies of any and all communications from CAFB to ensure you get any necessary response from Floris Shell Lewis the Director of Serve Ministries will vacate her role next week The position had not yet been filled Allan Ballenger has retired as the Executive Director As of yesterday Barbara Miner is now our Executive Pastor Though she will probably be the one who signs the partner agreement she has no involvement in the day to day operation of our food distribution program and would prefer not to receive routine emails from CAFB If you need us to complete a form please let me know Thanks Katie Rakestraw Floris UMC 7037985826

Description: Good morning I notice that the June early closure and blackout dates are published on Partnerlink thank you July 4 falls on Thursday this year Will the food bank be closed just on July 4 or will there also be service interruptions on the 5th Thereve also been some summer shutdowns for staff activities in the past are any of those on the horizon Its really helpful to know those dates as far in advance as practical Thank you
Summary: Customer wants to know if the food bank will be closed on July 4th and 5th due to summer shutdowns.
Comments: 052024 0865d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f56557216bfff4b2d9297d6f6bb6cf175 | 052024 08f58131cbb67d43c7b30d6b58d40bd077Hi krakestrawflorisumcorg We just received your request for assistance We will reply as soon as possible Thank you Customer Relations Capital Area Food Bank | 052024 11b15fa988bc6049b4aa6fe30b7a3629c1Good morning Thank you for contacting customer support The food bank has announced closures on June 7th for an allstaff outing and June 27th and 28th for an Inventory Blackout While the food bank will be closed on the 4th of July this will not cause any interruptions on July 5th We will be open and operating at our normal capacity Please keep in mind that holidays are not considered a business day so orders scheduled on July 5th will lock a day earlier to honor our 3 business day rule for locking orders All updates for holiday and staff closings can be found on the main landing page on Partnerlink Charity
input_text: PartnerLink -> General Questions | Customer wants to know if the food bank will be closed on July 4th and 5th due to summer shutdowns.

Description: Hello Thank you for reaching out If the order could be rescheduled to a time later this week that would be great We are having a pantry this Saturday and we are running low on oil produce and meats as this is part of the order IaTMm actually out of town this his week so could you please reach out to Christian PfefferKleemann his number is 1 3164048 I also included him in the distribution list of this email If there is no option to reschedule for this week can you please reschedule the order to January 24th 10 am In this case please remove the produce from the order if you canaTMt hold it safely at the food bank Thank you for your support of our community Dominic Sent from my iPhone On 7 Jan 2025 at 12 i Good afternoon I hope this email finds you well Due to the inclement weather and the resulting closure of our operations today we are unable to process orders as scheduled We kindly ask if you would like to reschedule your order for some time next week to please respond to this email Please contact us at your earliest convenience to let us know your preferred date and time for rescheduling or if you would prefer us to cancel your order We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding and cooperation If you have any questions or need further assistance please do not hesitate to reach out Thank you for your attention to this matter and we look forward to hearing from you soon Best regards Partner Support
Summary: Customer wants to reschedule their order due to inclement weather.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Data/Time Change - Reschedule
Comments: 012025 0265d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f9268066554384ab487f4a900f0dd7539 | 012025 0541Good afternoon Thank you for your message I understand the urgency of your order especially given the current needs of our clients I have escalated this issue to my team in the Operations Department who will be back at work tomorrow We will do our best to fulfill your order as quickly as possible I will follow up with you tomorrow to provide an update on your order Thank you | 012025 0965d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f7718867a2bc448d896232d74d57fb249Hello Due to the Federal Holiday tomorrow I am available to help all day if you are able to make the delivery then Please let me know if that is something you can work with Best regards Christian PfefferKleemann | 012025 0131Good afternoon | 012025 0165d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460f7718867a2bc448d896232d74d57fb249Yes this will work I should be available at the church at noon and awaiting your arrival Im am glad this could be worked out Best Christian PfefferKleemann | 012025 0156Perfect DH Manager of Customer Relations Distribution Network Evolution Capital Area Food Bank P 5713909875 7035410179 4900 Puerto Rico Ave NE Washington DC 20017 Please email all customer service questions or concerns to so that one of my colleagues or I can assist you promptly Thank you

Description: Please contact me to help me update the hours of operation for the Fort Washington Food Pantry Jane Hudnall Fort Washington Foode Pantry Manager fortwashingtonfoodpantrygmailcom 2026798898
Summary: Customer wants to update the hours of operation for a food pantry.
Comments: 092024 08b15fa988bc6049b4aa6fe30b7a3629c1Good afternoon Thank you for reaching out While we will not be hosting another training session there are tools available to assist you in updating your Hours of Operation You can find a guide in PDF format called under the Partner Resource Tab on PartnerLink This document provides instructions on how to update your hours of operation Once you are logged into PartnerLink click on your agency name to access your Account Overview Under Additional Information you will find a button labeled Click on it to view the hours currently listed for your agency If the hours are correct click to confirm If the hours are not correct please make the necessary changes by clicking aedita submit them and once approved by your Regional Coordinator the updated hours will be officially updated Screenshots have been included to provide visual guidance If you still need assistance please attend one of our online Office Hours every Wednesday from 10am10am Thank you Charity

Description: Good day I hope this finds you well Is it possible to reschedule SO189181 For pickup this Friday January 10 2025 If not please cancel the order Please confirm receipt Thank you Isha Lee 2022855354 Sent from my iPhone On Jan 7 2025 at 12 i Good morning Partners We hope this message finds you well We are reaching out to address the challenges posed by the inclement weather we have experienced over the past couple of days Unfortunately this has left us two days behind in our pulling schedule which has led us to make the difficult decision to cancel the orders originally scheduled for Wednesday January 8th We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause to your distribution plans We understand how vital these deliveries are to your operations Please note that we will need a response from your agency by the end of the business day on or the order will be canceled on our end Please note that we are rescheduling orders with the earliest openings being midweek next week This is due to our delivery and pickup schedules being full before the snow we experienced this week Please reach out to us to coordinate further We are fully aware of the impact that inclement weather can have on our collective efforts and we remain committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and yours during this time Thank you for your understanding and support as we navigate this situation together We are working quickly to get back on schedule Warm regards Customer Relations
Summary: Customer wants to reschedule an order due to inclement weather.
Request Category: Orders - Pre delivery -> Data/Time Change - Reschedule

Description: Ms Jackson Gaithersburg HELP is an allvolunteer organization that has been serving the needy in our local community for 56 years and we are dedicated to supporting as many families with food each month as we can In fact last month HELP served 500 families at our pantry in the Festival Shopping Center We have only a couple of volunteer drivers who can deliver food and we must reserve that service for those individuals who live alone or have a partner who also cant drive to the pantry You had asked for us to deliver food to a family of 9 people As you must know from your previous food pickups which total 30 since 2018 we pack according to family size and that would not be appropriate when there are ablebodied family members in residence As an allvolunteer organization we strive to serve as many families as possible but we can sustain our operation only if almost all of our families pick up at the pantry If a client needs to come to the pantry via bus we offer bus tokens so that transportation to and from the pantry is free It is not an insult to let someone know that we have limited capabilities for food delivery Its just a fact And we would not ask to see proof of disability We explain our limited delivery ability to any client who asks about delivery Also our coordinators always provide information about how to get food from Manna andor the Gaithersburg Hope Center Clients can get food from us while also getting food from those other organizations In that way we hope clients find they have more money to apply toward rent or utility bills Our yearly client survey results validate that outcome and that our volunteers treat clients with dignity and promptness We could serve your family very quickly with food if someone could drive to the pantry or come via bus Margo On Thu Nov 14 2024 at 2 Dear Capital Area Food Bank Support Team My name is Yvette Jackson and I am writing to report an issue I experienced with food assistance delivery from Gaithersburg HELP On Monday at 954 pm today indicating that the refusal and statement were correct due to the volunteer nature of the service and their inability to deliver help to a large household I was directed to seek assistance from other sources such as Manna Food I believe there might be a misunderstanding or miscommunication regarding our eligibility for this service Attached to this email you will find documentation of my disability for your review Please note the MetroAccess document on line 16 which indicates that my disability prevents me from independently using the accessible Metrobus and Metrorail system for all trips I am unable to walk due to L spine disease with a risk of falls panic attacks anxiety and nontolerance to crowds At this point I feel my disability age and household circumstances are severely limiting my access to essential help I would appreciate your assistance in reviewing this matter and providing any necessary support to ensure that my household can receive the food assistance we need as it appears Gaithersburg Help is not completely meeting the needs of the community I value your prompt attention to this issue and look forward to your response
Summary: Customer reports issue with food delivery from Gaithersburg HELP and requests review of their eligibility for service.

Comments: 112024 1238c8249284fe40dc890161d65a68f6d3Thank you for inquiring about the availability of turkeys With Thanksgiving and the holiday season approaching we understand the demand for turkeys from our clients and partners We have two trucks scheduled that arrived in early October with purchased turkeys available on a firstcome firstserved basis Please note that these turkeys will not be free and will have associated costs Donated turkeys are traditionally received closer to Thanksgiving If our Food Resource Team is able to procure additional turkeys they will also be available for purchase on a firstcome firstserved basis If you are looking for alternative sources of turkey offerings or regionspecific turkey donations we recommend reaching out to your Regional Team Its important to note that Customer Service will be involved in the allocation of turkeys All turkeys unless already preplanned for will be available on a firstcome firstserved basis through PartnerLink We appreciate your understanding and cooperation CiArra | 112024 0265d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460fd6e6f1d0018344aa8f009a965916532aHello See email below Who is our regional team so that I can contact them regarding Turkeys | 112024 02f58131cbb67d43c7b30d6b58d40bd077Customer has replied after the ticket has been resolved | 112024 0238c8249284fe40dc890161d65a68f6d3The coordinator for DC is Erin Brown 12027695614

Description: Good morning I have a question on items from two previous orders From SO161546 We ordered salad dressing 111043 The items had assorted dates that had best by dates past 6 months or more Are they OK since the majority of them are cream based From SO163161 I had asked for best by dates for items but the dates on the reply email did not match the items we received except for 1 Are the dates sent on the email the best until dates 100856 Hot fries 100854 Glutino bars 100858 Caramel Popcorn The best by dates are important to us because it tells us how much to order if we want to keep items for future distributions Thank you Sincerely Andrea
Summary: Customer wants to know if the items they received are still good due to their expiration dates.
Request Category: Feedback - Concern / Negative -> Quality - Non Produce
Comments: 062024 0865d20c5a0c84458e8ce1adb90d07460fbdf05ada890a4498826043dcc5ca4eea | 062024 08f58131cbb67d43c7b30d6b58d40bd077Hi dreyv27yahoocom We just received your request for assistance We will reply as soon as possible Thank you Customer Relations Capital Area Food Bank | 062024 12b15fa988bc6049b4aa6fe30b7a3629c1Good afternoon Thank you for contacting customer support I am looking into the dates for your previous orders to confirm that they are safe to eat As a reference feel free to use our Food Coding Guide as a resource when navigating different dates I will follow up with you as soon as I get updates regarding the products you asked about Charity | 062024 0451Hi Andrea I hope you are doing well I wanted to talk to you about the ticket you submitted I apologize for the delay One of my team members brought up your concerns regarding some items you received from us After discussing your concerns about the salad dressing with my management and the Food Sourcing Team responsible for all the food that comes into the Food Bank here are some points I wanted to share with you Regarding the salad dressing our Food Resourcing Team does not have a specific recommendation for shelfstable milk or salad dressing in our Food Coding Guide We suggest following the USDAs recommendation regarding this product specifically and apologize for not being able to provide further insight Partners and clients should use their eyes noses and taste buds to determine if a food is spoiled and therefore unsafe to eat Of course if a product is showing any signs of spoilage such as rot mold foul odor etc we will accept a return I have brought this issue to managements attention and I agree that our Food Coding Guide needs improvement I will raise this with our leadership for further review In response to your second point I acknowledge the importance of bestby dates for our partners and their clients However our team faces challenges in obtaining these dates for donated products One challenge arises during packing events when volunteers check and pack donated items into cases labeled as assorted on the menu These assorted cases contain items from various donors and are packed without specific bestby date information for each individual product Another challenge occurs when we receive donated products in different case lotswith different dates making it difficult to provide accurate bestby dates to our partners We dont know what case lot your order is going to be pulled from until its pulled the day before or two before its delivered or picked up Although we practice FIFO inventory management the dynamic nature of our inventory makes it challenging to predict bestby dates with certainty As our inventory of donated products increases we are committed to improving our processes to provide partners with the information they need to make informed decisions We are continuously seeking ways to improve our processes and I encourage partners to participate in the upcoming Partner meetings in July to address any questions or recommendations regarding product dates Thank you for bringing these concerns to our attention Warm regards

Description: Forwarded Message Thu Aug 15 2024 at 451 PM Item removed from order Hello i just saw that item 100757 was removed from our delivery tomorrow It is a pallet of meals to go that we were going to offer our clients as back to school choice We were planning giving at least 23 per family Right now we are going to end up giving 1 per family It is disappointing I dropped the other individual cases and decided on a pallet thinking that surely CAFB knows how many full pallets they have of an item since it is large and there are only 15 posted It is even more disappointing because every week it seems as though an item is being removed from our order This week it is a full pallet of meals to go Last week it was 6 cases of eggs and 3 weeks ago a bin or corn I thought that when the number of items get posted to Partner Link these are the number of items available to order I am trying to understand why the items are missing by the time items get pulled And it should not be happening almost every week I have the same pallet ordered for delivery date 823 Am I going to assume that item is also gone since the same item is now not available or missing We appreciate what you all do but there is always room for improvement Thank you for your time and help Sincerely Andrea
Summary: Customer is disappointed that an item was removed from their order and is concerned about the consistency of missing items.

Description: Hello I would like to reschedule the Jan 8 delivery to the following Wednesday Jan 15 Either the 810 am or the 1012pm delivery window is acceptable Please confirm so I can have the volunteers on hand Thank you Kristine Hesse Grace Episcopal Church On Tue Jan 7 2025 at 12 Good morning Partners We hope this message finds you well We are reaching out to address the challenges posed by the inclement weather we have experienced over the past couple of days Unfortunately this has left us two days behind in our pulling schedule which has led us to make the difficult decision to cancel the orders originally scheduled for Wednesday January 8th We sincerely regret any inconvenience this may cause to your distribution plans We understand how vital these deliveries are to your operations Please note that we will need a response from your agency by the end of the business day on or the order will be canceled on our end Please note that we are rescheduling orders with the earliest openings being midweek next week This is due to our delivery and pickup schedules being full before the snow we experienced this week Please reach out to us to coordinate further We are fully aware of the impact that inclement weather can have on our collective efforts and we remain committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and yours during this time Thank you for your understanding and support as we navigate this situation together We are working quickly to get back on schedule Warm regards Customer Relations
